name: Witch Guild Survivor
description:
Witch Guild Survivor is a fun horde roguelite game where you play as a witch that must survive from the monsters using your poweful spells! Collect white orbs and upgrade your magic spells. Choose a combination of various elements to generate synergies between them in each run. Let's have some fun in this horde survival game!

DYNAMIC BUILDS

In this roguelite survival game, you can choose a combination of various elements to generate synergies between them in each run.

SELECT YOUR WITCH, WAND AND SPELL

Choose from the witches, wands and spells available in this demo version. Each combination generates a different game experience.

FEATURES

  • 10 different elements that add 50 improvements and different game experiences
  • Each upgrade can be upgraded up to level 4 to boost your strategy
  • Unique Special Attack mechanic
  • Random quest system
  • Can be played with or without a mouse
  • Its a fun horde survival game!!
